column1: Smart Cars, Smart Phones, Smart Homes, Smart Cities. Dumb Dumb Dumb Sheeple? #covid19 @wuwhoflupsyop

The Future Is Here. The Zombies Are Now #Covid19 How many companies are off to the races to create a supposed vaccine? Inovio, J&J, Moderna, Novavax, Bill Gates Foundation, he Galilee Research Institute out of Israel. ALL because they want to save us, my arse. #wuwhoflupsyop

We see the real motives here. A fever gun coming to an airport near you. Hegelian Dialectic. We've read your playbook. We know you want yet another vaccine to add to the thousands in your roster. CDC alone holds at least 56 patents. WHAT? #covid19 #wuhanhoax #whowuflupsyop

Does President Trump lack vision in dealing #covid19 or is it the CDC & WHO's #ineptitude? How does the task force & Pence factor in? #Pencedemic https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1233444641480925184

What did he say of substance in this clip? Panic causes markets to plunge. Is it merited? Of course based on the #COVID19 world hunger games. Meanwhile Bezos is rejoicing. Consumers stocking up. That's commerce right there
